hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to put his mouth on the place where I had drunk from, and he would drink from what was leftover by me, while I was menstruating

chapter.ara-name: باب مُؤَاكَلَةِ الْحَائِضِ وَالشُّرْبِ مِنْ سُؤْرِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Eating With A Menstruating Woman And Drinking What Is Leftover By Her
